phrases: You can tell if he is dead or not by doing that?
You are five already, and you do not even know that?
It does not look like he is carrying anything worth any money.
All right, we will reap something!
He does not look injured, huh?
I think it was a desert somewhere.
In any case, as of today, you are one of us.
It might be rough, but do not cry, the way Chiko does.
Listen, from now on, you have to call me Big Sister.
There is no need to be shy.
Without any parents, we all have to help each other.
If you want to tell us something, speak up.
It is been a long time since I talked to anyone.
About two years ago, there was this gigantic tsunami.
It swallowed up the whole city!
This place is packed with kids like us that do not have homes.
Uh-oh, they are making their regular stop.
Once I take Chiko across, I will be right back for you.
They make sure to come here once every day.
They are trying to catch us and toss us in the pokey.
According to the folks who escaped from there,
they were picked on every day, and got smacked with slippers.
You cannot come out of there for the rest of your life, that is for sure.
On top of that, they cut your nails every night!
You are hurting me, I tell you!
She does not want to go.
You children up in the tree, come on down here!
If you do, you will get new clothes, a clean room, and a hot meal!
We do not want any of that!
So then, do you plan to go on living in a place like this forever?
You think we are about to put ourselves in your care!?
We will go on living by ourselves just fine!
Apparently, he got shipwrecked out at sea, and washed up here.
Hey, this boy is still little, so give him a comparable share of food.
The same goes for you, does not it?
Well, anyhow, as a fellow person without any family, let us stick together.
Come on over, come on over!
That was pretty fun, was not it?
Even without parents, children still grow up!
We are growing up fine, huh?
We have been causing trouble all over, after all.
Sometimes there are people that come after us at night here.
What is it, if you did not come out here to pee?
I have a mother, and I was actually on my way home to her.
Oh, so the little boy has a home, huh?
I am sorry, I just could not say anything.
There is nothing you have to apologize for.
I guess I jumped to the wrong conclusion.
In a bamboo grove on Mount Paozu.
Please tell me the way, if you would!
Everyday, she tells me to study, study, and it gets annoying.
Being annoying is okay, as long as she is around.
I go to a cram school.
There is stuff I like, and stuff I do not like.
Yeah, yeah, that is right, huh?
I hate gym and math, but art is my best subject!
The tsunami happened before Ena started school.
Do you guys... want to go to school?
If you go to the institution, you can do all you like.
No way, that place smells like medicine!
Yeah, that goes for me, too.
And someone who is escaped from there ought to know!
How about we all drive to Gohan's house tomorrow?
Let us go, let us go!
They are coming, they are coming!
They are too young for that!
You are no ordinary kid, huh?
There is nobody there, even if I did go back.
To defeat the Saiyans, and to save...
